page.title: 12Tredegar House (continued)
page.content: After the interviews had been conducted the children came to the following conclusions. I think the park is an ideal place for a{walk}or a{picnic.}It is the ideal place for older people but it does not cater enough for teenagers. It needs a small{swimming pool}or a more elaborate{adventure playground.}I also think the{adventure playground}should be moved from its present position to the grass area in front of the outbuildings wherethe ground is safer if a child fell. It would be safer as well if it was away from the lake as young children have a tendancy to wander. Also there are not any toilet facilities for disabled people and the cafe has steps leading to it which can cause great difficulty for those in wheelchairs.
